ygData.subject: [eqbards] Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: Well folks, Elfson has gotten the hell out of... well hell (part 2).  So at lvl 36, I think its time to get my guise of deciever. I have some maps of Lower
ygData.messageBody:
Well folks, Elfson has gotten the hell out of... well hell (part 2). So at
lvl 36, I think its time to get my guise of deciever.

I have some maps of Lower (and Upper) guk, and have bought a few invis to
undead potions.

Any reccomendations for making it to the assasin room? Whats the easiest
path there? How do I change over from normal invis to invis to undead
(without becoming visible and dying)?

thanks :)

Elfson Allegro
36 Half Barbarian Bard, Veeshan
